name: chevaline_alpha
title: Chevaline Alpha
description: By students, for students. This addon is a suite of features to generally enhance your experience with UAH's online services. If you have any questions or requests, please send them to the package maintainer, we'd like to hear from you!
author: Christopher [ctag] Bero

preferences.name: sso_enabled
preferences.title: Enable the 'Real SSO' feature? This will allow you to specify SSO credentials from the tools alt menu and then actually use Canvas!

preferences.name: sso_user
preferences.title: Account to use with Chevaline's SSO handler.
